plot: A woman gets pregnant and the father needs to go to war. The child grows up believing its father is a shadow on the wall. Finally the father returns...
title: Hình bóng
plot_es: A woman gets pregnant and the father needs to go to war. The child grows up believing its father is a shadow on the wall. Finally the father returns...
plot_en: A woman gets pregnant and the father needs to go to war. The child grows up believing its father is a shadow on the wall. Finally the father returns...
